SELECT m_prj_component.id, m_prj_component.projectId, m_prj_component.name, m_prj_component.userlead, m_prj_component.description, m_prj_component.sAccountId, m_prj_component.lastUpdatedTime, m_prj_component.createdTime, m_prj_component.status, m_prj_component.createduser, createdUserTbl.avatarId AS createdUserAvatarId, concat(createdUserTbl.firstname,' ', createdUserTbl.lastname) AS createdUserFullName, s_user.avatarId AS userLeadAvatarId, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', s_user.lastname) AS userLeadFullName, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m_prj_bug.id) FROM m_prj_bug, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_bug.id=m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType='Project-Bug' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Component' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('Component') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId=m_prj_component.id) AS numBugs, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m_prj_bug.id) FROM m_prj_bug, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_bug.id=m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType='Project-Bug' AND m_prj_bug.status IN ('Open', 'InProgress', 'Reopenned') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Component' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('Component') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId=m_prj_component.id) AS numOpenBugs, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m_prj_task.id) FROM m_prj_task, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_task.id = m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId = m_prj_component.id AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType = 'Project-Task' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Component' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('Component')) AS numTasks, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m_prj_task.id) FROM m_prj_task, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_task.id = m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType = 'Project-Task' AND m_prj_task.status IN ('Open') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Component' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('Component') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId = m_prj_component.id) AS numOpenTasks, m_prj_project.name AS projectName, m_prj_project.shortName AS projectShortName FROM m_prj_component LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_prj_component.userlead=s_user.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user AS createdUserTbl ON (m_prj_component.createduser=createdUserTbl.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_prj_component.projectId=m_prj_project.id)
